list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a tough-skinned terrestrial mollusk which typically lacks a shell and secretes a film of mucus for protection. It can be a serious plant pest.
a slow, lazy person; a sluggard.
an amount of an alcoholic drink, typically liquor, that is gulped or poured.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he took a slug of whiskey
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta lấy một con sên của rượu whisky

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an elongated, typically rounded piece of metal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the reactor uses embedded slugs of uranium
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lò phản ứng sử dụng Slugs nhúng của uranium

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a line of type in Linotype printing.
a part of a URL which identifies a particular page on a website in a form readable by users.
drink (something, typically alcohol) in a large draft; swig.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she picked up her drink and slugged it straight back
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô nhặt đồ uống của mình và trượt thẳng lại
